name: com.cavrnus.csc
description: Cavrnus enhances 3D workflows by providing developers a seamless drag-and-drop toolkit for embedding collaborative features directly into Unity projects.

samples.description: Essential prefabs and scenes to get started quickly.
Examples showing how to use roles and policies to tailor content for users.
.holo is a universal file format developed by Cavrnus to deploy live content at runtime.
Xr specific prefabs meant to work on a variety of Xr devices.
Provided Ar components demonstrating adjusting world origin for tracked objects.
Examples which integrate specific standard render pipleine features.
Examples demonstrating how user streams can be used on textures.
